item.title: First Post
item.description: The site is still under construction! Stay tuned for updates!

item.title: HOME
item.description: Hi, I am Sherly. Although, most of the time I go by Sherly Sherly. My interests lies in the field of Data Science and Engineering. I am an ex-Software Engineer at Zendesk and ex-Data Scientist both at Zendesk and Go-Jek. I am currently pursuing my Double Masters in Data Science under EIT Digital Masters Programme at Polytech Nice Sophia. I am heading to KTH Royal Institute of Technology for my second year 2019-20 this August.
